participant_1.background:
I enjoy reading about health issues to learn more about my body and how to take care of it.
i love eating at mcdonalds.
i live with my best friend.
In my free time, I like to bake cupcakes and watch wrestling.
i recently proposed to my girlfriend of three years.

participant_2.background:
I love fresh peaches, especially when they're sweet and juicy.
I play guitar and listen to music to relax and express myself.
My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.
i like classic radio programs.
my favorite past time is cooking.

content.text: Hello, I am doing well. Thank you for asking.
I recently proposed to my girlfriend and she said yes!
That is wonderful news! Congratulations to both of you.
Thank you very much. We are very excited to start planning our wedding.
That is great to hear. I am sure it will be a beautiful event.
I am sure it will be too. We are both very excited about it.
What are your plans for the honeymoon?
We are not sure yet. We are thinking about going to the beach or the mountains.
Either of those would be a great choice. I am sure you will have a wonderful time.
Thank you very much. I am sure we will
